body_html:
Some benchmark on GPU

input_shape = [100, 100, 100, 500],
param = model.WeightedSum([param, One, gradient, lr], param)
orginal: 46.43ms
new CUDA: 32.15ms
new CUDNN: 31.16ms

So this diff can reduce about 30% time of WeightedSumOp on training jobs.

body:
Some benchmark on GPU

input_shape = [100, 100, 100, 500],
param = model.WeightedSum([param, One, gradient, lr], param)
orginal: 46.43ms
new CUDA: 32.15ms
new CUDNN: 31.16ms

So this diff can reduce about 30% time of WeightedSumOp on training jobs.
